titleStmt.title: By the commissioners from the Parliament of England whereas wee have received information that not onely divers souldiers of the Army, but severall disordered and loose persons, exact contribution or free quarters at their pleasure ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. Commission for Ireland.
Anglesey, Arthur Annesley, Earl of, 1614-1686.

notesStmt.note: "Given at Dublin, the three and twentieth day of Iune, 1647. Arthur Annesley, Rob. King, Rob. Meredith, Mic. Iones, Iohn Moore."
Other title information from first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
